name: 狂の世界-Crazy World (itch)
description:
1. Story

The hero got lost in a strange world on his way home from work. There were masked madmen and odd-shaped creatures in the world. They attack those who have lost their way into another world.

The protagonist sought a way to escape from another world while fighting or escaping from them.

2. Game content

The hero can hide under the grass or under the table. You can also fight with the gun you picked up on the way.

You need three sacred treasures to escape from another world.

A girl is lost in a different world. She can talk to her and give her presents.

If the heroine and the heroine eat too much food from another world, they will not be able to leave the other world.

You can change the costume of the heroine if certain conditions are met.

3. Difficulty

You can choose from easy, normal, and hard.

The number of bullets and recovery items are different.

The heroine that appears depends on the difficulty level.
